result.eng: Don't forget to bring your umbrella.
result.ga: ná déan dearmad scáth fearthainne a thabhairt leat
result.orig: ná déan dearmad scáth fearthainne a thabhairt leat
result.html: ná déan dearmad scáth fearthainne a thabhairt leatDon't forget to bring your umbrella.
result.ponchtml: ná déan dearmad scáṫ fearṫainne a ṫaḃairt leatDon't forget to bring your umbrella.

result.eng: We cannot bring it in because of how big it is.
result.ga: ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá sé
result.orig: ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá sé
result.html: ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá séWe cannot bring it in because of how big it is.
result.ponchtml: ní féidir linn é a ṫaḃairt isteaċ toisc a ṁéad atá séWe cannot bring it in because of how big it is.

result.eng: I bring a sandwich to work.
result.ga: bíonn ceapaire liom go dtí an obair
result.orig: bíonn ceapaire liom go dtí an obair
result.html: bíonn ceapaire liom go dtí an obairI bring a sandwich to work.
result.ponchtml: bíonn ceapaire liom go dtí an obairI bring a sandwich to work.
